title: The New Apple Pencil: Why Are They Removing Features?
description:
NEW COURSES: http://bradsartschool.com

Earlier this week Apple announced a new Apple pencil that works with modern iPads and supported USB-C charging. At first this looked terrific but on closer inspection they are removing the one feature that makes drawing with the apple pencil so nice... pen pressure.
